name: DEMONLORD STRIKE BACK
description:
Demon Lord Strike Back! 

"Joined the Demon Lord Party, strike back the king together!"

Every day, every night, heroes from king castle try to come and want to defeat the Demon Lord who want to live peacefully, now the Demon Lord is getting annoyed so he want to strike the king back! 

How to play 

WASD - Movement 

Left - Click at enemy heroes to convince them to join the Demon Lord party! 

Left - Click at platform and choose heroes to spawn 

Credit 

Happy Boi / Game Developer , Programmer 

Nzquare / Game Designer , Artist

Materials - Freepik / rawpixel.com / macrovector / upklyak
